### 🧠 Purpose
Why this refactor or cleanup is needed.

### 🔍 Changes Made
Summarize what was refactored.

### 🧩 Verification
Explain how you verified no behavior was changed.

### ✅ Checklist
- [ ] Code is cleaner or more efficient
- [ ] No functionality changes
- [ ] Builds and tests pass
